channel.title: Help please
channel.description: i need to know how to move npc's and add things to their shops please help

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

For future posts, please remember to post your base and source. Otherwise, I’m going to take a shot in the dark here by assuming you are using Delta. Look at the spawning of an NPC.

spawn = 212 2661 3302 0 2663 3304 2659 3300 1

See the 4 numbers before the 1? How far you want the npc to walk to the east, the next one is how far to the north, the next one is how far to the west, the next one is how far to the south. Take the coordinates of where you placed the NPC, add to those numbers maybe 3, and you will get the npc walking a maximum of 3 spaces around the original spot where he spawned.

For shopping, go to shop.cfg.

shop = 1 Pk_Point_Exchange 2 2 7449 2

shop = 1 – that’s the shop number
PK_Point_Exchange – thats the shop name
2 2 – buy and sell (Returns a boolean if true)
the next numbers are the ones that you care about
for example above, I want to sell the item ID of 7449 at this shop, with an amount of 2.
Keep in mind, all of this is spaced by tabs.

Read full topic
